title: How to use Ornns upgraded items.
body: I played ornn and got my forst S- which im happy about but in the shop I saw the upgraded items. And it said I couldn't get them. But why and what do I need to do too get them?

replies.body:
Hi. Congrats on earning an S on Ornn. 

Just this patch Riot have made some major changes to Ornn, and one of them is that his passive ability Masterwork is now locked until level 13. This means that his upgrades are locked until he reaches level 13. 

Riot changed this because they felt too many champions were hitting their powerspikes too early in the game using his Masterwork ability.

If you'd like to see the patch notes I have attached them [here.](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/09/patch-718-notes.html)
They are not gold efficient early so Riot blocked them being bought before lvl 13 or 11 cant remember which one
